# Cloned from bcm94345wlpagb_p2xx.txt 
#######################################################################################
# NVRAM file for BCM43455/Huawei, Dual Band,  


#1.固定的一些ID设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
NVRAMRev=$Rev: 498373 $
sromrev=11
vendid=0x14e4
devid=0x43ab
manfid=0x2d0
prodid=0x06e4
nocrc=1
boardtype=0x6e4
boardrev=0x1304

#2.
# 晶体频率和国家码/区域码/RSSI校正, 请华为软件/射频人员自行调整
# mac地址以HOST配置进来的优先
xtalfreq=37400
xtal_swcapio=0x9966
macaddr=00:90:4c:c5:12:38
ccode=CN
regrev=38
rssicorrnorm_c0=-2,-2
rssicorrnorm5g_c0=-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2

#3. boardflags, 请咨询Broadcom
boardflags=0x00080001
boardflags2=0x40000000
boardflags3=0x48200100

#4. 固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
phycal_tempdelta=15
rxchain=1
txchain=1
aa2g=1
aa5g=1
tssipos5g=1
tssipos2g=1
femctrl=0
AvVmid_c0=0,157,1,126,1,126,1,126,1,126

#5. pa校准参数和功率上限,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
pa2ga0=-183,5312,-641
pa2ga1=-35,4475,-535
pa5ga0=-145,5625,-637,-150,5641,-644,-147,5591,-641,-164,5474,-649
pa5ga1=-132,3597,-492,-112,3522,-480,-120,3561,-484,-111,3504,-477

#6. 固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
itrsw=1
pdoffset2g40ma0=10
pdoffset40ma0=0xaaaa
pdoffset80ma0=0xaaaa
extpagain5g=2
extpagain2g=2
lowpowerrange2g=0
lowpowerrange5g=0
tworangetssi2g=1
tworangetssi5g=1
fdss_level_2g=2,2
#pacalpwr2g=11
cbfilttype=0
pacalindex2g=65
cckdigfilttype=5  
pdoffsetcckma0=0x1 
#cckpwroffset0=-2

#7. 2g目标功率设定,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
maxp2ga0=72
ofdmlrbw202gpo=0x0088
dot11agofdmhrbw202gpo=0x8888
mcsbw202gpo=0x88888888
mcsbw402gpo=0x88776666

#8. 5g目标功率设定,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
maxp5ga0=68,68,68,68
mcslr5glpo=0x0000
mcsbw205glpo=0x65333333
mcsbw205gmpo=0x65333333
mcsbw205ghpo=0x65333333

mcsbw405glpo=0x77777777
mcsbw405gmpo=0x77777777
mcsbw405ghpo=0x77777777

mcsbw805glpo=0x99999999
mcsbw805gmpo=0x99999999
mcsbw805ghpo=0x99999999

#9. 天线控制, 不要动,请咨询Broadcom
swctrlmap_2g=0x00040004,0x00020002,0x00040004,0x010a02,0x1ff
swctrlmap_5g=0x00100010,0x00200020,0x00200020,0x010a02,0x2f4
swctrlmapext_5g=0x00000000,0x00000000,0x00000000,0x000000,0x000
swctrlmapext_2g=0x00000000,0x00000000,0x00000000,0x000000,0x000

#10. DFS的一些设定, 不要动,请咨询Broadcom
vcodivmode=1
deadman_to=481500000
ed_thresh2g=-54
ed_thresh5g=-54
eu_edthresh2g=-54
eu_edthresh5g=-54

#11. OOB设定,软件工程师决定,0x1 for UART enable, 0x2 for GPIOs, 0x8 for JTAG, 0x10 for HW OOB
#tempthresh：温控上阈值
#temps_hysteresis：回差，下阈值=tempthresh - temps_hysteresis
muxenab=0x10
tempthresh=80
temps_hysteresis=15
#12. 调节信道之间信令功率平坦度
powoffs2gtna0=5,4,0,-2,-3,-1,-2,-3,-2,-2,-2,0,0,0
powoffs2gtna1=5,4,0,-2,-3,-1,-2,-3,-2,-2,-2,0,0,0

#SAR Control
dynamicsarctrl_2g=0xac
dynamicsarctrl_5g=0x9c
